item.description:
Why not?

Seriously, our dogs seem to find endless amusement playing with each other while we watch, eat, and talk about them. Hugging other people's dogs is allowed. You can talk about your dog for as long as you like, and no one will avoid you!

And I promise to bring the dog toys next time! Every time I have brought them in the past, the dogs have ignored them for the most part.

Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meet, May 17, 3-5 pm, Especially for Pets, Sudbury
